name: matlab-nuxt-app
description: A comprehensive MATLAB and Nuxt.js project for deep learning experiments, mobile phone dataset analysis, and MATLAB capabilities checking

scripts.dev:all: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] üöÄ Starting MATLAB Nuxt App with all services...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ÔøΩ Loading environment variables...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; try { Get-Content .env | ForEach-Object { if ($_ -match '^([^#][^=]+)=(.*)$') { $key = $matches[1].Trim(); $value = $matches[2].Trim(); [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($key, $value, 'Process') } } } catch { Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ‚ö†Ô∏è  No .env file found, using system environment variables' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ÔøΩüìä Checking service configurations...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; if ($env:SENTRY_DSN -and $env:SENTRY_DSN -ne 'https://your-dsn@sentry.io/your-project-id' -and $env:SENTRY_DSN -notmatch '^https://your-dsn@') { Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ‚úÖ Sentry: Configured (Error tracking active)' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ‚ö†Ô∏è  Sentry: Not configured or using placeholder DSN' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; if ($env:ALGOLIA_APP_ID -and $env:ALGOLIA_APP_ID -ne 'YourAlgoliaAppIdHere' -and $env:ALGOLIA_APP_ID -notmatch '^Your') { Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ‚úÖ Algolia: Configured (Search indexing active)' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] ‚ö†Ô∏è  Algolia: Not configured or using placeholder values' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; Write-Host '[DEV-ALL] üîÑ Starting services...' -ForegroundColor Cyan" && concurrently -t -n PY,NUXT -c blue,green "cd python_api && ..\venv\Scripts\python api.py" "pwsh -NoProfile -File scripts/start-nuxt-dev.ps1 -Port 3000 -HostName localhost"
scripts.typecheck:mem: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 npx vue-tsc --project tsconfig.ci.json --noEmit --skipLibCheck && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=16384 npx tsc -p tsconfig.ci.json --noEmit
scripts.typecheck:ci: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 npx vue-tsc --project tsconfig.ci.json --noEmit && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 npx tsc -p tsconfig.ci.json --noEmit
scripts.test:manual: set PLAYWRIGHT_TEST=1&& set NUXT_TEST=1&& playwright test
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org baltzakisthemiscom --project matlab .output/public && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org baltzakisthemiscom --project matlab .output/public

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: npm run precommit:check && npm run lint:yaml && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
